Background:

In class, we have briefly touched on working with S3 objects. There are various online sources on this subject available, e.g. Hadley Wickham’s chapter on S3 objects, Cyclismo’s tutorial, Abishek Tiwari’s blog post, …

Write a blog post addressing one of these topics:

  • At an S3 class of your choice discuss a set of functions/methods/approaches that allow you to interact with the class. Make sure to give plenty of examples!
  • Explain how a user can define a new S3 class with objects and methods at a small example of your choice.

Instructions:

Go to https://github.com/Stat585-at-ISU/blog for instructions about how to prepare and submit your blog post.

Class posts:

  • Working with date and time by Lawrence Hii
  • Working with date and time by Chelsey Legacy
  • Working with date and time by Dinesh Poddaturi
  • Time is Relative by Kiegan Rice
  • Working with date and time by Xiangmei Zhang
